mapper.select: select /** AdmRolePgmBtnAuth.selectAll */ BTN_NO, ROLE_ID, MNU_PGM_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_ROLE_PGM_BTN_AUTH
mapper.insert: insert /** AdmRolePgmBtnAuth.insert */ into ADM_ROLE_PGM_BTN_AUTH( BTN_NO, ROLE_ID, MNU_PGM_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{btnNo}, #{roleId}, #{mnuPgmId}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update /** AdmRolePgmBtnAuth.update */ ADM_ROLE_PGM_BTN_AUTH set BTN_NO = #{btnNo}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId}, MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId}, upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and BTN_NO = #{btnNo} and ROLE_ID = #{roleId} and MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId}

update /** AdmRolePgmBtnAuth.updateWithMap */ ADM_ROLE_PGM_BTN_AUTH set
BTN_NO = #{btnNo},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId},
MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId},
upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and BTN_NO = #{btnNo} and ROLE_ID = #{roleId} and MNU_PGM_ID = #{mnuPgmId}
